1/* $NetBSD: printactiveaddr.c,v 1.3 2018/02/04 08:19:42 mrg Exp $ */
2

8 * Added redirect stuff and a variety of bug fixes. (mcn@EnGarde.com)

10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13
14#if !defined(lint)
15static __attribute__((__used__)) const char rcsid[] = "@(#)Id: printactiveaddr.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:40 darrenr Exp $";
16#endif
17
18
19void
20printactiveaddress(v, fmt, addr, ifname)
21 int v;
22 char *fmt, *ifname;
23 i6addr_t *addr;
24{
25 switch (v)
26 {
27 case 4 :
28 PRINTF(fmt, inet_ntoa(addr->in4));
29 break;
30#ifdef USE_INET6
31 case 6 :
32 printaddr(AF_INET6, FRI_NORMAL, ifname, 0,
33 (u_32_t *)&addr->in6, NULL);
34 break;
35#endif
36 default :
37 break;
38 }
39}
40
